attributes.action: Give Doctors and Nurses better pay and working conditions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many doctors and nurses do too many hours in the workplace, They should be paid their worth, and not just what the government thinks that they should get. If people like rock stars can get thousands of pounds just for singing, Then Doctors and Nurses should be given much more, after all, They are saving lives.
